channel.title: How to make admins drop items. [Hybrid]
channel.description:
Okay so im having a problem making admins+ drop. There is a StaffConfig and a Config file with
ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = true; yet they still cant drop.
Thanks for Reading even if you can't help.

item.title: How to make admins drop items. [Hybrid]
item.dc:creator: @Dj_Nm.E Dj Nm.E
item.description:
@Dj_Nm.E wrote:

check on config. where it says undroppable items// sometimes it has && c.rights = 2");
i had that problem with [hybrid] and thats what it had.
hope that helps

Read full topic
item.source: How to make admins drop items. [Hybrid]
